ai-patthana13.9:0.2_0: Having given the immaculateness of the Dhamma, namely, Tissaka,
ai-patthana13.9:1.1_0: With seeing the cause, without cause, without reason, because of not seeing, because of what is the cause and condition for the sake of seeing.
ai-patthana13.9:1.1_1: This is the section in brief.
ai-patthana13.9:2.1_0: ‘... for the sake of all six days.’ ...
ai-patthana13.9:2.1_3: He should not give formal support.
